paper_abstract: We present a vortex particle method coupled with a penalization technique to simulate single and multiple swimmers in an incompressible, viscous flow in two and three dimensions. The proposed algorithm can handle arbitrarily deforming bodies and their corresponding non-divergence free deformation velocity fields. The method is validated on a number of benchmark problems with stationary and moving boundaries. Results include flows of tumbling objects and single and multiple self-propelled swimmers. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Simulations of single and multiple swimmers with non-divergence free deforming geometries
